title: Papa No Iukoto O Kikinasai! - Sorairo No Hibiki
alternative_title: Echoes of Sora ; Papa no Iukoto o Kikinasai! - Sora-iro no Hibiki
status: Echoes of Sora ; Papa no Iukoto o Kikinasai! - Sora-iro no Hibiki
description:
Description :
        The eldest of the three sisters. Sora takanashi is a 2nd grader in the middle school. She is 14 years old and has a tsundere personality. She normally refers to YÅ«ta as "older brother (Onii-chan)". She has fairly good grades in school but is not adept at cooking. This is the spin-off story of her before the main series started.
